programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: For some inmates, the only way out of prison is "paroling legit," or leaving in a body bag; others earn a lump sum of good time by completing programs or holding a prison job, while a few will take any chance to try to escape.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convicted sex offender becomes the victim of a brutal assault that leaves him unconscious and in the hospital; his assailants say the attack was warranted, but what they don't know might bring regret.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An infamous inmate is booked after a daring prison escape, but faces consequences that go well beyond what a judge could give him; Lockup tells the story of a criminal legend, his family and the devastating consequences of his decisions.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate's troubled past leads to angry outbursts inside the jail, while another arrives after an alleged crime spree that sounds like it's right out of a movie; a young mother could go to prison if she's found guilty of robbery.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A pregnant woman faces the charge of killing her husband two months away from giving birth; her future lies in the hands of a judge; another inmate, also facing a murder charge, pays a price when he disobeys orders.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A murderous shooting spree erupts on a major religious holiday; a new inmate catches the jail staff's attention; a father of five receives haunting news from home.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The arrest of two brothers in the murders of four women.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Inmates who become disruptive at the Penitentiary of New Mexico are transferred to the lock-up units in level 5 or 6; the trouble is, their behavior doesn't always improve; this is a lesson rookie officer Amy lee is learning the hard way.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Prison officials initiate a shakedown after gang members in Level 6 overpower an officer in the recreation area, take her keys and stab a rival gang member; this type of incident simply adds to the tension already felt in the supermax facility.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: For some inmates, the only way out of prison is "paroling legit," or leaving in a body bag; others earn a lump sum of good time by completing programs or holding a prison job, while a few will take any chance to try to escape.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convicted sex offender becomes the victim of a brutal assault that leaves him unconscious and in the hospital; his assailants say the attack was warranted, but what they don't know might bring regret.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An infamous inmate is booked after a daring prison escape, but faces consequences that go well beyond what a judge could give him; Lockup tells the story of a criminal legend, his family and the devastating consequences of his decisions.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Computer hacker Max Butler's online scheme which sold millions of stolen credit cards leads the feds on a year-long chase.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Royal Scam: Kings of Counterfeit
programme.desc: The $10 million king of counterfeit money lives it up.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Kenneth Starr: Naked Greed: Celebrity Scam Artist
programme.desc: An accountant to stars mismanages clients' money, pockets millions and marries an exotic dancer.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Loan Scam: Money for Nothing; Hawaiian Punched: Fraud in Paradise
programme.desc: A sting operation brings down a Denver businessman; a charismatic con man uses the promise of huge returns to put $30 million in his own pocket.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Miami party boys turned arms dealers bid on government contracts worth millions to fight the war on terror, inspiring the 2016 film "War Dogs."

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Flashy former Michigan cop and corrupt real estate dealer John Bravata uses his company, nicknamed the Billionaire Boys Club, to steal $50 million from 440 middle-class investors.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Clean Teeth, Dirty Money; Comic Book Murder
programme.desc: A sex trafficking ring, comprised of violent pimps who exploit women, enlists a Chicago dentist to launder their money; a plot to steal a valuable comic book collection ends in murder.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: From luxury properties to an ostrich coat, the hard charging political insider uses his power and influence to fuel a multimillion-dollar mortgage and tax fraud.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Leaders of a polygamous religious sect demand perfect obedience from followers, luring them into welfare fraud and stealing more than $2 million from American tax payers.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Payday loan scam mastermind, Scott Tucker, swindles millions of cash-strapped borrowers with his convenient online loan business and uses the profits to fuel his race car team dreams.
